survey_name: Home Office Ergonomics and Productivity Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand how home office setups impact productivity and employee well-being, focusing on ergonomic factors and workspace design.

questions.question_text: How many hours per day do you typically spend working in your home office?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How many hours per day do you typically spend working in your home office?

questions.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic furniture or accessories do you currently use in your home office? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture the range of ergonomic items respondents might use.

script.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic furniture or accessories do you currently use in your home office? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current home office setup in terms of comfort and productivity?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for this question to measure satisfaction levels effectively.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current home office setup in terms of comfort and productivity?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your home office setup?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback on potential improvements.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your home office setup?

questions.question_text: Does your employer provide any support or reimbursement for home office equipment?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to understand employer involvement in home office setups.

script.question_text: Does your employer provide any support or reimbursement for home office equipment?
